game.name: Kill The Guy
game.description:
Are you a true fan of gun shooting games for boys? If yes, you have come at the right platform where you will spot nothing but a great collection of fun shooter games designed especially for you. Kill The Guy is one of the best action games you will find to satisfy your craving for the shooting urges. Are you ready to go on a unique challenge and show the world that you also have the emerging shooting skills? Join this brand new action challenge right away to take your shooting fantasy to a new level. 

In this weapon aiming game your objective is to aim your enemies and eliminate them from the area you are presently in. Try to aim the head of your enemies to obtain the power shots that will surely help you to clear the levels fast and earn the highest score. A good level of precious and excellent focus skills will help you to achieve the objective of the game. Play this free online HTML5 game and learn why people from all across the world are getting crazy for it. 

Use the mouse when you explore it on desktop and tap the screen when you play it on your mobile phone. It is not as difficult as you thought of. Take your time and aim to the perfect head shot of a racist guy. Good luck to check out more fun shooter games on our free and cool game website. We have a good collection of mobile games meant for the gamers of all ages. Find out the one that fits your needs and helps beat your boredom fast.
